data.message: I really don't understand why you bother with this.  My name is Troy Valentino, a businessman with several national and international businesses.  As I went over a hundred friends, you blocked me.  I know thousands of friends personally, I mean friends that I buy aboriginal artwork from, entertainers I manage, models I promote, kids I send to Hockey Schools, people I sell to, people I know and met in person, people I have dinner with, people I have coffee with, etc., etc., etc.  What is your concern?  I have never said, do, or implied anything that will jeopardize national security.  I never even said the f word.
